example.name: not nice adjectival
example.text: Much of Mr. Lane's film takes a highly romanticized view of life on the streets (though probably no more romanticized than Mr. Chaplin's notion of the Tramp as the good-hearted free spirit).
example.arg: [ view] [ of life on the streets]

predicate.note: Frames file for 'romanticize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.
